ComicInfo.Summary:
In the final and nerve-shattering conclusion of this 4-part miniseries, our heroines Vampirella and Evily face off against the ultimate evil as they confront the powerful demon Asteroth. Will they survive? Will Clare awaken from her comatose state? And what new revelations will they discover? How will Vampirella deal with her new understanding of her place in the universe?
